blogPost.title: The drama highlights a fundamental problem. Being a royal is about serving the institution. It does not work for those seeking individual attention  https://t.co/AzeKYCNbZy
blogPost.author: The Economist

localize.full_text: 这部剧凸显了一个根本问题。作为皇室成员，就是要为体制服务。对于那些寻求个人关注的人来说是行不通的https://t.co/AzeKYCNbZy。
這部劇凸顯了一個根本問題。作爲皇室成員，就是要爲體制服務。對於那些尋求個人關注的人來說是行不通的https://t.co/AzeKYCNbZy。

previous.title: Hawa Abdi guided the growth of her village from a one-room rural maternity clinic, into a 400-bed hospital with three operating theatres, a school for 850 children and seven feeding centres. Our obituary from last year #IWD2021 https://t.co/mqNrNdCpdO

localize.full_text: Hawa Abdi指导她的村庄从一个只有一间房的农村妇产科诊所发展成为拥有400张床位、3个手术室、850名儿童的学校和7个供餐中心的医院。我们去年的讣告#IWD2021 https://t.co/mqNrNdCpdO
Hawa Abdi指導她的村莊從一個只有一間房的農村婦產科診所發展成爲擁有400張牀位、3個手術室、850名兒童的學校和7個供餐中心的醫院。我們去年的訃告#IWD2021 https://t.co/mqNrNdCpdO

next.title: "Do your best", she always said. Love what you do. Be constantly curious. And learn that it is not dumb to ask a question. Our obituary for the mathematician from 2020 #IWD2021 https://t.co/GXRzMy4qEp

localize.full_text: 她总是说："尽力而为"。热爱你所做的事情。要不断好奇。并学会问问题并不笨。我们的讣告从2020年开始数学家#IWD2021https://t.co/GXRzMy4qEp。
她總是說："盡力而爲"。熱愛你所做的事情。要不斷好奇。並學會問問題並不笨。我們的訃告從2020年開始數學家#IWD2021https://t.co/GXRzMy4qEp。
